description: Try our easy to follow Sprout, Bacon, Scallop & Chorizo Skewers recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Sprout, Bacon, Scallop & Chorizo Skewers Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place sprouts in a microwavesafe bowl with 1/4 cup water. Cover with a double layer of plastic wrap. Microwave on high for 2 minutes. Drain and cool. Halve lengthways.
Roll bacon and thread alternately onto 6 skewers with sprouts. Combine syrup and oil in a small bowl and brush over skewers.
Thread scallops alternately with chorizo onto additional 6 skewers. Brush with garlic butter.

Heat a chargrill pan or barbecue plate over mediumhigh heat. Add skewers and cook for 2 minutes on each side, brushing with syrup or butter, or until charred and cooked through. Satter over parsley and serve.
